item.title: About
item.description: About Me I’m Boobalan, a Web Developer, IT Consultant & Tech. Teacher based in India. Allo, I am a indian software engineer from Chennai but working remotely most of the time. First of all, thank you for visiting me here. It’s such a pleasure to have you here!. A couple of words about my academic and professional life: I graduated from university with a Bachelor of Technology in IT in 2014.
